author: Adam Kroupa
comment: Love this watchface. It's pretty awesome, I especially like the transition of the numbers when notification pop-ups / when I close app. Only downside is that I am missing the month number there. But it isn't needed that much so I am giving the 5 stars.

author: Keith Cohen
comment: Needs option to disable background for OLED devices.
title: Nice.

author: William
comment: Bought, installed, where it's it?? Can't find it....What happen. Refund, tell me where I went wrong. I'll try it again

reply.author: RunaR
reply.content:
It can take a minute or two before the watch face is available on the watch. Sometimes it helps to restart the devices or use the 'sync all apps' option in the Android wear app.
Kind regards, RunaR

title: What th ???

reply.author: RunaR
reply.content: I'll be happy to help, if you can tell me what does not work. It can take a minute or two before the watch face is available on the watch, due to the detailed graphics. Kind regards, RunaR
